issue.message: All com.android.support libraries must use the exact same version specification (mixing versions can lead to runtime crashes). Found versions 28.0.0, 27.1.1. Examples include `com.android.support:animated-vector-drawable:28.0.0` and `com.android.support:support-media-compat:27.1.1`
The following unrelated icon files have identical contents: title_spinner_pressed.9.png, title_spinner_selected.9.png
